thread.title: £1 million worth of holiday prizes to be won
thread.title_full: £1 million worth of holiday prizes to be won - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: £1 million worth of holiday prizes to be won
text: The Telegraph Travel Awards is the world's largest biggest travel reader survey and to celebrate its launch, The Telegraph are offering readers the change to win an incredible set of holidays, from luxury chalets, to exclusive villas and a grand tour of Italy when entering the Awards. How to enter See the newspaper on Saturday, October 17, 2015 for details of how to enter the competition. telegraph.co.uk
